Grammar_Elements

Class GrammarContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grammar_Elements.GrammarContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GrammarContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that acts as a container for a full GTTM analysis of a piece of music. Well formedness constraints are checked during construction of this container.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GrammarContainer(ProlongationalBranch topProlongationalBranch, TimeSpanReductionBranch topTimeSpanReductionBranch, MetricalContainer metricalStructure, HighLevelGroup topLevelGroup, ProlongationalGroup topProlongationalGroup)
      Constructs a grammar container object that encapsulates a grammatical analysis of a piece

    • Constructor Detail

      • GrammarContainer

        public GrammarContainer(ProlongationalBranch topProlongationalBranch,
                        TimeSpanReductionBranch topTimeSpanReductionBranch,
                        MetricalContainer metricalStructure,
                        HighLevelGroup topLevelGroup,
                        ProlongationalGroup topProlongationalGroup)
                 throws GroupingWellFormednessException,
                        BranchingWellFormednessException
        Constructs a grammar container object that encapsulates a grammatical analysis of a piece
        Parameters:
        topProlongationalBranch - the topmost branch of the prolongational analysis
        topTimeSpanReductionBranch - the topmost branch of the time-span reduction analysis
        metricalStructure - the metrical structure of the piece
        topLevelGroup - the topmost group of the grouping structure analysis
        topProlongationalGroup - the topmost group of the prolongational grouping structure analysis
        Throws:
        GroupingWellFormednessException - Thrown if the grouping structure analysis does not span the whole metrical span
        BranchingWellFormednessException - Thrown if various branching well formedness constraints are violated.

        Returns:

      • getTopProlongationalGroup

        public ProlongationalGroup getTopProlongationalGroup()
        Returns:
        the highest level of the prolongational grouping structure
